src:
Story behind the photo: Selfie time
01 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
A commuter takes a selfie in front of the Vidhana SoudhaThe picture was clicked by reader SUNIL KUMAR VIf you have a picture and a story to share, send us the picture with your name and number at mybangaloremirror@timesgroup.com
